description: Easy to prepare and good for snacks.
keywords: Fried vegetable,Pescatarian,Air fryer,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Vegan,Peanut free
name: Crunchy Chili Garlic Peas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and thaw the peas then dry them with paper towel. Try to get as much moisture as possible.
Put them in the bowl then add oil and all other ingredients. Coat evenly.
Spread the coated peas in aluminum foil or baking paper.

Bake 200Â°C in the airfryer for 1st 30 minutes, check if crunchy enough. If needs more time, bake them for additional 10-15 minutes or more. Don't forget to shake and stir them around to cook evenly. Let it cool and enjoy.
